Your Band

Who knows? Maybe your band should be playing at the show. Give us a shout! You can send an email to bands@srqamfest.com or fill in this form – you do you.

CØASTLINE

CØASTLINE is a pop punk band based in the Sarasota area. Forming just over a year ago, the band has released a single and is currently hard at work producing their first EP.

Bargain Bin Heroes

Bargain Bin Heroes are a high energy Punk/Ska band from Fort Myers and are no strangers to the SWFL music scene. They have performed together for years, and at some of the area's biggest and best music festivals. Their latest EP Droppin' the Deuce is out now.

Perfect Sequence

Perfect Sequence is a SWFL alternative rock band. Their album -- AWAKEN -- is out now on Spotify and iTunes. Check out their latest video Us & Gravity on YouTube.

Offset Era

Offset Era formed in August of 2014 and recently released their neweset EP - New Blood. The group tours the Southwest Florida area, and continues to write and record new material. The band's sound is a mix of pop punk, ska, hip hop and alternative.

JawKnee

JawKnee music is a one-man acoustic project from Bradenton FL. By putting an up beat tempo to a large variety of musical genres, as well as original music, JawKnee is sure to keep your toes tappin' and your head bobbin'.

Neverless

Neverless is an alternative/ska/punk band from Sarasota, FL formed in March of 2018. They blend a horn section and creative songwriting into a rock format, occasionally crossing genres, and always catching ears.

Monument Beach

Monument Beach, formerly known as Help! Police!, is a Tampa based ska punk band created in 2015 by friends and veterans of the Florida ska scene.

Two Inch Voices

Two Inch Voices is a Rock/Alternative Metal band from Sarasota, Florida formed in 2007. Their sound is a mixture of driving guitars, swooning, aggressive, melodic vocals, and brick wall rhythms.
